html:
Jan 20 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Alstom, Daimler and Novo Nordisk, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Alstom ALSO.PA: Jefferies raises to buy from hold

* Daimler AG DAIGn.DE: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Elementis Plc ELM.L: HSBC cuts to reduce from hold

* Novo Nordisk NOVOb.CO: Credit Suisse cuts to neutral from outperform

* Unicredit CRDI.MI: SocGen raises to hold from sell

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
